name: dinosaurian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
typical of or relating to dinosaurs: The skeleton exhibits several dinosaurian features. Evidence for a dinosaurian origin of birds increased.
More examplesFewer examplesThe creature had a large dinosaurian mouth.Some of these dinosaurian giants could have had rock-filled stomachs.Children have a thirst for all things dinosaurian.
